Blog.post: Hello every1.My name is Kunal.I come in peace.Im from St.Patricks School.im from Singapore.im 12 years old.Im in secondary one which is the 7th standard for those who dunno.I would like to be a doctor when i grow up.I like to hear rock music.I like bands like evanescence and linkin park.And also wrestling entrance songs.I like to watch action pack movies and horror movies.I admire emma watson as her acting is very good.4 those who dunno,she plays a role in harry potter and the prisoner of azkaban as hermione. If i ever had wishes to make,they will be:when bill gates passes away,i wish that he would give me all his earnings[sorry 4 those who are a fan or....of bill gates but this are all dreams and jokes].By then,i will be the richest boy in the world.Then,i will get married at the age of 13 to a beautiful young gal.After i get married,i will own 12 hotels in the U.S.A.And thats the bottomline cause I said so.Hahaha.Anyway,for those wrestling fans,if u wanna know latest results on wrestling,just simply click this: urlLink http://www.wwe.com .For those socca fans,go to this website: urlLink http://www.soccernet.com .And 4 those who like the band linkin park,go to: urlLink http://www.linkinpark.com . Okay people.I wanna tell u all why i admire Emma Watson.She's a cool person.her actin is very good.she can show her temper at anytime and she can be kind,friendly and also helpful at anytime.4 those who dunno,i have emma's e mail and her real address.if u want them,pls send me an email at:kurtcena@hotmail.com .Well.....thats all about Emma. Now back to my Show.My favourite sport is socca(soccer).Its not the one which u throw,its the one which u kick.thats 4 those who dunno.My favourite club in the English League are Chelsea and Arsenal F.C.No offence but...my rival is........MANCHESTER UNITED.The reason why i hate Man Utd is because they are very arragont.Whenever they win a game,they will always show off!During matches,they will play rough as though like the wanna break a person's leg.Thats da reason.4 the Spanish League,the club i like is Juventus and A.C Milan.The club which i hate is....NONE!!!!And people,i have more socca websites 4 u folks.here they are: urlLink http://www.football365.com , urlLink http://www.teamtalk.com , urlLink http://www.mirror.co.uk/sport/ , urlLink http://www.tribalfootball.com Now is World Wrestling Entertainment time.So folks,my favourite superstars in the wwe from RAW are:Goldberg,The Rock,Chris Jericho,Chris Benoit and Victoria.The ones i hate are:Kane Evoulution(Triple H,Batista,Ric Flair and Randy Orton) and Trish Stratus. And from SMACKDOWN,i like:Kurt Angle,John Cena,The Undertaker,Eddie Guerrero and Torrie Wilson.The ones i hate are:John Bradshaw Layfield,Booker T and Miss Jackie. To B Continued In The Next Season Of Kunal Ordinary
